name.title: Project Name
name.description: The name of the Checkmarx project.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The date and time when the project was created.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The date and time when the project was last updated.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A set of tags associated with the project.

repoUrl.title: Repository URL
repoUrl.description: The URL of the repository associated with the project.

mainBranch.title: Main Branch
mainBranch.description: The main branch of the project's repository.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: The origin or source of the project.

criticality.title: Criticality
criticality.description: The criticality level of the project.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the scan. Possible values: Queued, Running, Completed, Failed, Partial, Canceled.

branch.title: Branch
branch.description: The branch of the repository that was scanned.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The date and time when the scan was created.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The date and time when the scan was last updated.

projectId.title: Project ID
projectId.description: The identifier of the project to which this scan belongs.

userAgent.title: User Agent
userAgent.description: The user agent used to initiate the scan.

statusDetails.title: Status Details
statusDetails.description: Detailed status information for the scan.

riskId.title: Risk ID
riskId.description: The unique identifier for the API security risk.

apiId.title: API ID
apiId.description: The identifier of the API associated with the risk.

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The severity level of the API security risk.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the API security risk.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the API security risk.

httpMethod.title: HTTP Method
httpMethod.description: The HTTP method associated with the API risk (e.g., GET, POST).

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL endpoint associated with the API risk.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: The origin or source of the API risk.

documented.title: Documented
documented.description: Indicates whether the API is documented.

authenticated.title: Authenticated
authenticated.description: Indicates whether the API requires authentication.

discoveryDate.title: Discovery Date
discoveryDate.description: The date and time when the API risk was discovered.

scanId.title: Scan ID
scanId.description: The identifier of the scan in which the risk was found.

sastRiskId.title: SAST Risk ID
sastRiskId.description: The identifier of the related SAST risk, if available.

projectId.title: Project ID
projectId.description: The identifier of the project associated with the API risk.

state.title: State
state.description: The state of the API security risk.

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The severity level of the SCA finding.

state.title: State
state.description: The state of the SCA finding.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the SCA finding.

cweId.title: CWE ID
cweId.description: The Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) identifier related to the vulnerability.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the SCA finding.

created.title: Created
created.description: The date and time when the SCA finding was created.

firstScanId.title: First Scan ID
firstScanId.description: The identifier of the first scan in which this SCA issue was detected.

packageIdentifier.title: Package Identifier
packageIdentifier.description: The identifier of the affected package.

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.description: Recommended actions to remediate the SCA finding.

recommendedVersion.title: Recommended Version
recommendedVersion.description: The recommended version of the package to resolve the vulnerability.

confidenceLevel.title: Confidence Level
confidenceLevel.description: The confidence level of the SCA finding.

firstScanId.title: First Scan ID
firstScanId.description: The identifier of the first scan in which this container security issue was detected.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the container security finding.

state.title: State
state.description: The state of the container security finding.

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The severity level of the container security finding.

confidenceLevel.title: Confidence Level
confidenceLevel.description: The confidence level of the container security finding.

created.title: Created
created.description: The date and time when the container security finding was created.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the container security finding.

packageName.title: Package Name
packageName.description: The name of the affected package in the container.

packageVersion.title: Package Version
packageVersion.description: The version of the affected package in the container.

imageName.title: Image Name
imageName.description: The name of the container image.

imageTag.title: Image Tag
imageTag.description: The tag of the container image.

imageFilePath.title: Image File Path
imageFilePath.description: The file path within the container image where the issue was found.

cweId.title: CWE ID
cweId.description: The Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) identifier related to the vulnerability.

description: Represents a KICS issue detected by Checkmarx One
title: Checkmarx KICS

firstScanId.title: First Scan ID
firstScanId.description: The identifier of the first scan in which this KICS issue was detected

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the KICS issue, indicating if it is new, recurring, or has been fixed.

state.description: The state of the KICS issue, reflecting its verification and remediation status
state.title: State

created.title: Created At
created.description: The date and time when the KICS issue was first identified

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the KICS issue.

fileName.title: File Name
fileName.description: The name of the file where the KICS issue was found.

line.title: Line Number
line.description: The line number in the file where the KICS issue occurs

issueType.title: Issue Type
issueType.description: The type or category of the KICS issue

expected_value.title: Expected Value
expected_value.description: The value that was expected in the configuration

value.title: Value
value.description: The actual value found in the configuration that triggered the KICS issue
